TopicTitle: The mangled up History Blender Game

Articles.Content: 2024 the international space treaty is breached by a shower curtain company claiming all the land on the moon ,and declaring itself independent from the world.
2025 the world is obliterated by a 10km wide asteroid
2013: Comet Ison now inside earth, it is dancing to the music of worlds supermusicstar, James Cargney
1930, Barrack Obama discovered the dog, Pluto orbiting in the Kuiper belt while eating a cheese steak in an apple store.
in the year 2014, dragons arrive to Earth from the planet blurb
2015, a Saturn 5 lagged into the present creating a time slip in which Nazis control the moon's pineapple factories.
In 2016, Australia will hire Samuel L. Jackson as their Prime Minister.
In 1969, 2 brave men walked on the surface of a hamburger.
in 2013 some one necros a post from the 1600s....

In 1941, the film Citizen Kane directed by Orson Welles debuts despite a massive outcry from Newspaper giant William Randolph Hearst. Mr Hearst claims the film's namesake Charles Kane alludes to him, but Welles denies this saying that Kane is based off of Lucille Ball and Wile E. Coyote.
in 1492, Christopher Columbus dies on his Yacht off the cost of California
Alexander Hamilton discovers gravity in year 9001 using a trampoline, but his findings are ridiculed by the Church of Arceus because its doctrine forbids the use of bannanas.
In the Year 1908, Adolf Hitler died in a tragic skycrane accident.
Michal Collins was the first to land and put feet on Duna Grounds by the year 36, Day 54.
In 1904, Albert Einstien and Issac Newton invented outer space.
In 1903, the first flight ever made by a powered aircraft ended in tragedy, killing Orville Wrong of the Wrong brothers
in 350 BC Caesar founded the Soviet Union
in 1969 Henry VIII rode a unicorn to Titan
In 1988 Senator Preston Brooks and President Ronald Regan fight to the death.
USA got independence from USSR in 1949
in 1999 the entire world is now the Union of China.
Cleopatra sailed the ocean blue, to find Africa in 2005.
The Wheel was invented in 1506
The ukrainian empire, which have taken the control of the whole eurasia, sent today the frist manned mars misson.
On December 25th, 2001 Chuck Norris drafts the declaration of independence declaring American Independence from Pharaoh Ramesses II
